amendment.description: To require a report on Federal agency compliance with respect to establishing an Office of Small and Disadvantaged Business Utilization.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3633 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3633 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Cardin to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5501) To require a report on Federal agency compliance with respect to establishing an Office of Small and Disadvantaged Business Utilization.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3633 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Cardin to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3633 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
